title: 大家都喜欢在什么地形做房子？
author: 绅士囧
txt_content:
我先来——海上
平原也不错，最不喜欢热带雨林

replies.author: 火星使者
replies.txt_content: 土地平旷小平原~

replies.author: cod_chick13
replies.txt_content: 平原或大海。

replies.author: rainsojey
replies.txt_content: 空中好！空中没怪

replies.author: hgx100
replies.txt_content: 建在水下233

replies.author: Wsbyeah
replies.txt_content: 在天上铺一块平地然后在上面做别墅

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢山地 半山腰挖一个洞就是房子
平原，不喜欢沙漠和丛林（主要不喜欢看这2种生态地形的草方块{:10_507:}）

replies.author: BCcat
replies.txt_content:
黑森林：木材多
平原：不用整理地形
树林：风景不错

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content: 平原最好，海上感觉比较费材料吧，，热带雨林其实有也有好处就是不缺木头土壤肥沃

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content:
我才不管生物群系呢！
平地有资源就行了！

replies.author: zyx永新
replies.txt_content: 草原或后面是山，前面是海

replies.author: duang2333
replies.txt_content: 比较平的地方，动物多

replies.author: 深蓝の回忆
replies.txt_content: 平地，盆地，海上的话。。。心血来潮时造一个

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 虚空——不被打扰，黑暗环境，世界最深处。

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content: 海岛

replies.author: Loc_vco
replies.txt_content: 平原吧 平平哒 =-=表示本人不会建筑

replies.author: 鸭蛋只吃黄
replies.txt_content: 山洞里.......方便，可以挖矿可以打猎

replies.author: purelove_3
replies.txt_content: 喜欢海滩建别墅

replies.author: dhji
replies.txt_content:
平原
海邊
樹木叢生處

replies.author: WaterPast
replies.txt_content: 然而，我最喜欢在热带雨林间房子

replies.author: akronman
replies.txt_content: 雪地 或者边境之地

replies.author: ybwybw
replies.txt_content: 丛林树屋，山边矿洞，平原豪宅

replies.author: 水蘊臻
replies.txt_content: 就我一个喜欢雪原？

replies.author: 子弹～
replies.txt_content: 平原，这个地方不错

replies.author: 极光酋长
replies.txt_content:
平原、高原、盆地
三大地形最爱~

replies.author: 纷飛
replies.txt_content: 自然地形。。。。

replies.author: aq982
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 严哲立
replies.txt_content: 热带雨林的树中间666666666

replies.author: ygtrece13
replies.txt_content: 高空或者平原吧...平原动物多

replies.author: momo_mao
replies.txt_content: 我最喜欢在矿洞

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content: 高山上建房好

replies.author: fzh5837302
replies.txt_content: 平原，空中需要石头太累...平地好规划

replies.author: tzxwdu
replies.txt_content: 以前是山洞，后来是森林的平原里，现在喜欢在山崖上。工程量越大，住的越舒服
挖地洞=-=

replies.author: 锭椗
replies.txt_content: 不是中二病人，当然是平原啊{:10_506:}

replies.author: hfriend
replies.txt_content: 沙漠——貌似就我一个人喜欢

replies.author: Тιмγα姬
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢悬崖上2333
